name: Brain Squares
description:
The game consists of steps. Each step has two stages.

The first step is to remember the shape of the highlighted tiles.

In the second step, you need to click on the tiles to reproduce the shape from the first step. If you succeed, then you get points and move on, gradually increasing the difficulty and the number of points earned. If not, then your attempt burns out. After three attempts have been spent, the game is considered over.

Please write comments if you liked the game, and be sure to write comments with ideas and wishes for the development of the project.

In the future, there is a desire to release the game on mobile platforms with the introduction of a small amount of advertising.
The game works on phones now. You just need to open the game page in your phone's browser.
